name: Master Ball Shooting
description:
Master Ball Shooting is an addictive bubble shooting game. Experience the exciting trip across 100 fresh new levels in this legendary bubble world. Come and give it a shot, you will find endless joy!

Why you will love Master Ball Shooting:
- Lots of amazing levels of challenging puzzles and updates are available all the time
- Stunning and fascinating new maps
- Lots of amazing bubble props
- Fresh and bright bubble graphics
- Relaxing background music
- Easy and fun to play, hard to master
